About Shaffer Construction, Inc.

Founded in Los Angeles, Shaffer Construction, Inc. has established itself as a leading electrical contractor dedicated to delivering top-tier electrical solutions for both residential and commercial clients across Southern California. Our commitment to quality workmanship, safety standards, and customer satisfaction underscores every project we undertake.

Our Mission and Values

Our mission is to provide innovative, reliable, and efficient electrical services that meet the evolving needs of our clients. We prioritize safety, precision, and sustainability in every task, ensuring lasting value and peace of mind.

  • Quality Workmanship: We adhere to the highest industry standards to ensure durable and safe electrical systems.
  • Safety Standards: Safety is central to our operations, protecting our team and clients alike.
  • Efficiency: We streamline processes to deliver timely and cost-effective solutions.
  • Reliability: Dependability is at the core of our reputation and client relationships.
  • Customer Satisfaction: We strive to exceed client expectations through clear communication and expert execution.
  • Pioneering EV Infrastructure: Leading the industry with innovative EV charging solutions and installations.

Our Expertise

Shaffer Construction specializes in a wide range of electrical services tailored for both homes and businesses, including:

  • Commercial EV charging solutions
  • Residential EV charger installations
  • General electrical services
  • Complex electrical upgrades
  • Residential lighting design and installation
  • Commercial electrical setup optimization
  • Precision wiring services
  • Energy efficiency solutions
  • Electrical health checks

Our Commitment

At Shaffer Construction, Inc., we are dedicated to pioneering electrical solutions that power the future. Whether installing state-of-the-art EV charging stations or performing comprehensive electrical upgrades, our team upholds the highest standards of professionalism, skill, and dedication to excellence.
